amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 12: Nos. 291, 292, 293, 294, 295, 296, 297, 298, 299, 300, 301, 302, 303, 304, 305, 306, 307, 308, 309, 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, and 316.
